item.title: Le Travenues Technology Ltd Hits Intraday High with 7.13% Surge on 27 Jan 2026
item.description: Le Travenues Technology Ltd demonstrated robust intraday performance on 27 Jan 2026, surging 7.13% to touch a day’s high of Rs 216.2, significantly outperforming its sector and broader market indices. Time: 12 minutes ago

item.title: DLF Ltd. Hits Intraday High with 3.09% Surge on 27 Jan 2026
item.description: DLF Ltd. demonstrated robust intraday performance on 27 Jan 2026, surging to an intraday high of ₹604.45, marking a 2.69% rise during the trading session. The stock closed with a notable gain of 3.09%, outperforming the Sensex and its sector peers amid a broader market recovery. Time: 12 minutes ago

item.title: Raymond Ltd Q3 FY26: Operational Gains Overshadowed by Exceptional Items and Structural Challenges
item.description: Raymond Ltd., the integrated textile and realty conglomerate with a market capitalisation of ₹2,582.40 crores, reported a consolidated net profit of ₹3.58 crores for Q3 FY26 ended December 2025, marking a dramatic 95.04% year-on-year decline from ₹72.13 crores in the corresponding quarter last year. The quarter-on-quarter performance was equally concerning, with consolidated net profit plunging 68.54% from ₹11.38 crores in Q2 FY26. The stock closed at ₹387.90 on January 27, 2026, up 4.95% on the day but down 50.40% from its 52-week high of ₹782.00, reflecting investor concerns about the company's deteriorating profitability despite operational improvements. Time: 23 minutes ago

item.title: Nila Infrastructures Q3 FY26: Growth Momentum Masks Profitability Concerns
item.description: Nila Infrastructures Ltd., an Ahmedabad-based real estate developer with a market capitalisation of ₹352.00 crores, reported consolidated net profit of ₹4.65 crores for Q3 FY26 (October-December 2025), marking a concerning 23.52% sequential decline from ₹6.08 crores in Q2 FY26, despite posting robust revenue growth. The stock, currently trading at ₹8.82, has declined 21.95% over the past year, significantly underperforming the Sensex's 8.28% gain during the same period. Time: 23 minutes ago

item.title: Updater Services Ltd Stock Hits All-Time Low Amidst Continued Decline
